tool_description:
Integrate this API with your website's address form to quickly and accurately auto-fill UK postal addresses or find locations of addresses. This API contains a database of almost 1.7 million UK postcodes, along with address and location information.

For a simple demo, visit https://tomwimmenhove.com/ukpostcode/
name: UK Postcode
title: UK Postcode

api_list.name: /search
api_list.description: Find an street or post code using one of more key words

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results of the query (May be artificially limited)

postCodeTrimmed.description: The post code without any spaces (I.E. "SW1A2AA")

streetName.description: The full street name at this post code (I.E. "Downing Street")

longitude.description: The longitude of the post code (I.E. -0.127695)

latitude.description: The latitude of the post code (I.E. 51.50354)

plusCode.description: The plus code of the post code (I.E. "9C3XGV3C+CW")

region.description: The region where the post code is located (I.E. Greater London)

locality.description: The locality where the post code is located (E.I. London)

area.description: The area where the post code is located (I.E. England)

numUPRNs.description: The number of unique property reference numbers for the post code (I.E. 2)

api_list.name: /getpostcode
api_list.description: Find an exact match for a given post code.

required_parameters.name: postcode
required_parameters.description: An exact match for the post code to be queried
